options.content:
Individual Globus Tasks
  • This dashboard shows per-Globus Task level data, given a particular source and destination organization.
  • The table shows the volume, rate, duration (in hours, minutes and seconds) for the top 1000 largest tasks.
  • Click on the timestamp of an individual task to show more detailed information about that task.
  • Globus Task endpoints are de-identified, and private data sources are marked "Private".
  • Private Task data rates and totals are available via the toggle at the top of this dashboard.
  • All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.src_organization:$src AND meta.dst_organization:$dest AND meta.src_resource_name:$src_resource AND meta.dst_resource_name:$dst_resource AND (${internal:raw}(meta.src_organization:$src AND meta.dst_organization:$src)) AND (meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw}) AND meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND (( (!(_exists_:meta.src_ip)) OR meta.src_ip:${subnet.regex}*) OR ( (!(_exists_:meta.dst_ip)) OR meta.dst_ip:${subnet.regex}*))
